author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Deutsche Geothermische Immobilien: Martin Müller New CEO, Andreas Seidel New Chairman Of The Supervisory Board
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - DEUTSCHE GEOTHERMISCHE IMMOBILIEN AG :
* ANDREAS SEIDEL NEW CHAIRMAN OF THE SUPERVISORY BOARD FROM FEB 2, 2018
* MARTING MÜLLER TO REPLACE CHRISTOPH TRAUTSCH AS NEW CEO Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
